attributes.action: Campaign to televise the annual Army-Navy Rugby Match
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We strongly believe that the Army-Navy Rugby match at Twickenham should be broadcast on a major terrestrial television channel, because it would make wonderful television, it would reflect the public's admiration for the armed forces, it would show how sport should be played, and finally it would be very cheap.
